languages.text: {n}Назракей говорит медленно, смакуя каждое слово. Очевидно, что добраться до Маражая было его давним и горячим желанием — которое наконец-то исполнилось.{/n}
{n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Назракей говорит медленно, смакуя каждое слово. Очевидно, что добраться до Маражая было его давним и горячим желанием — которое наконец-то исполнилось.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai had long been his ardent desire which has finally come true.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei spricht langsam, kostet jedes Wort aus. Offensichtlich war es ein lange gehegtes, glühendes Verlangen, Marazhai zu finden, das nun endlich verwirklicht wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}

traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}纳札骸的语速很慢，细细品味着每个字。很显然，他一直都渴望找到玛拉斋，如今他的愿望终于实现了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纳札骸的语速很慢，细细品味着每个字。很显然，他一直都渴望找到玛拉斋，如今他的愿望终于实现了。{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei parle lentement, se délectant de chaque mot. Il est évident qu'atteindre Marazhai est un désir de longue date finalement assouvi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei parle lentement, se délectant de chaque mot. Il est évident qu'atteindre Marazhai est un désir de longue date finalement assouvi.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei habla lentamente, degustando cada palabra. Está claro que hacerse con Marazhai es un ansia que llevaba mucho tiempo queriendo realizar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei habla lentamente, degustando cada palabra. Está claro que hacerse con Marazhai es un ansia que llevaba mucho tiempo queriendo realizar.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイは一言一言を味わうように、ゆっくりと話す。マラズハイを苦しめることが長年の切なる望みであることは明らかであり、それがついに実現したのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ナズラクヘイは一言一言を味わうように、ゆっくりと話す。マラズハイを苦しめることが長年の切なる望みであることは明らかであり、それがついに実現したのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei; her bir kelimenin tadına vararak, yavaşça konuşuyor. Epeydir Marazhai'a ulaşmaya çalıştığı ve bunu nihayet başardığı için coşku hissettiği belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei speaks slowly, savouring every word. It is obvious that getting to Marazhai is a long-held ardent desire that has finally been realised.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei her bir kelimenin tadına vararak, yavaşça konuşuyor. Marazhai'a ulaşmaya uzun süredir çalıştığı ve bunu nihayet başardığı için çok coşkulu olduğu belli.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
